main event: A woman and her son observed a large orange boomerang-shaped object hovering above their car near Cochrane, Wisconsin on April 3, 1968.
interesting points: The observer reported the object caused her car's engine and radio to stop working., The object was described as being larger than a car and smaller than an airplane., The object was surrounded by a fog-like substance., The sighting lasted for approximately 10-15 minutes., The observer felt intense heat inside the car while the object was present.
witness description: A woman and her son, with the woman being described as a schoolteacher.
